name: BizinApp
tag_list: app-designer, app-developer, how-to-create-an-app, how-to-design-an-app, how-to-build-an-app, how-to-develop-an-app, apps, how-to-convert-a-website-to-an-app, app-marketing, app-promoter, mobile-marketing
overview:
Business in an App is a revolution from Business in a Box. It is a complete service fully integrated to run a business from an App. Everywhere, Anytime, No boundaries. The great differential Business in an App is that besides a normal website you can have your business in an APP.

All the main business activities can be run from your APP, but one can also run from a normal website. It can serve a stand alone App for already established company or the right way to start a business. It is the Final Way to Access the Ultimate Power of the Web, which is finally truly mobile.

milestones.description: Bizinapp is now on the Google Campus in London.
